p: In addition, individual case reports addressing single animal exposures are often reported. 33â€“35 However, it is also worth noting that the underlying causes of animal poison exposures are difficult to ascertain due to various reasons, such as exposures occurring at night or going unobserved by the owners. 25 36 Furthermore, in developing countries, there is the challenge of under-reporting of poison exposure cases, which could be attributable to the lack of knowledge and infrastructures. 37
